mapper.insert:
insert into traffic_res_product (id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_hotel, adult_cost_ticket, adult_cost_js, adult_cost_other, child_cost_hotel, child_cost_ticket, child_cost_js, child_cost_other, baby_cost_hotel, baby_cost_ticket, baby_cost_js, baby_cost_other, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_suggest_price,child_cost_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit,baby_cost_price,baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numSold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{adultCostHotel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultCostTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultCostJs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultCostOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childCostHotel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childCostTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childCostJs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childCostOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babyCostHotel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babyCostTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babyCostJs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babyCostOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{adultCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultSuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultSamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childSuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childSamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babyCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babySuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babySamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{badyProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{badyMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserveStockLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_hotel, adult_cost_ticket, adult_cost_js, adult_cost_other, child_cost_hotel, child_cost_ticket, child_cost_js, child_cost_other, baby_cost_hotel, baby_cost_ticket, baby_cost_js, baby_cost_other, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_suggest_price, child_cost_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_product where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_hotel, adult_cost_ticket, adult_cost_js, adult_cost_other, child_cost_hotel, child_cost_ticket, child_cost_js, child_cost_other, baby_cost_hotel, baby_cost_ticket, baby_cost_js, baby_cost_other, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price, child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_product

select id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_hotel, adult_cost_ticket, adult_cost_js, adult_cost_other, child_cost_hotel, child_cost_ticket, child_cost_js, child_cost_other, baby_cost_hotel, baby_cost_ticket, baby_cost_js, baby_cost_other,
adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price,child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_product where res_id = #{resId}
mapper.insert: insert into traffic_res_product (res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price, child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update ) values (#{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numSold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adultCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultSuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultSamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adultMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childSuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childSamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babyCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babySuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{babySamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{badyProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{badyMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserveStockLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_hotel, adult_cost_ticket, adult_cost_js, adult_cost_other, child_cost_hotel, child_cost_ticket, child_cost_js, child_cost_other, baby_cost_hotel, baby_cost_ticket, baby_cost_js, baby_cost_other, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price, child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_product where id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update traffic_res_product set res_id = #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_stock = #{numStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_sold = #{numSold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adult_cost_hotel=#{adultCostHotel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_cost_ticket=#{adultCostTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_cost_js=#{adultCostJs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_cost_other=#{adultCostOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
child_cost_hotel=#{childCostHotel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_cost_ticket=#{childCostTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_cost_js=#{childCostJs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_cost_other=#{childCostOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
baby_cost_hotel=#{babyCostHotel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, baby_cost_ticket=#{babyCostTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, baby_cost_js=#{babyCostJs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, baby_cost_other=#{babyCostOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
adult_cost_price=#{adultCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_suggest_price = #{adultSuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_same_pay = #{adultSamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_proxy_pay = #{adultProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adult_min_deposit = #{adultMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_cost_price=#{childCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_suggest_price = #{childSuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_same_pay = #{childSamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_proxy_pay = #{childProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_min_deposit = #{childMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, baby_cost_price=#{babyCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, baby_suggest_price = #{babySuggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, baby_same_pay = #{babySamePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bady_proxy_pay = #{badyProxyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bady_min_deposit = #{badyMinDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reserve_time = #{reserveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reserve_stock_limit = #{reserveStockLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_update =now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price, child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create,time_update from traffic_res_product where id in
#{item}

select id, res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price, child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create,time_update from traffic_res_product where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select res_id, product_name, product_code, num_stock, num_sold, adult_cost_price, adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay, adult_proxy_pay, adult_min_deposit, child_cost_price, child_suggest_price, child_same_pay, child_proxy_pay, child_min_deposit, baby_cost_price, baby_suggest_price, baby_same_pay, bady_proxy_pay, bady_min_deposit, reserve_time, reserve_stock_limit, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_product where res_id = #{resId}

SELECT trp.*,tr.date_start,tr.num_balance,pi.operator_id,pi.operator_name FROM traffic_res_product trp LEFT JOIN traffic_res tr on(tr.id=trp.res_id) LEFT JOIN product_info pi on(pi.id=trp.product_code) WHERE trp.id =#{id}
SELECT trp.*,tr.date_start,tr.num_balance FROM traffic_res_product trp LEFT JOIN traffic_res tr on(tr.id=trp.res_id) WHERE trp.product_code =#{productCode} and trp.res_id=#{resId} limit 1

select id,res_id,product_name,product_code,num_stock,num_sold ,adult_cost_price,adult_suggest_price,adult_same_pay,adult_proxy_pay,adult_min_deposit ,child_cost_price,child_suggest_price,child_same_pay,child_proxy_pay,child_min_deposit ,baby_cost_price,baby_suggest_price,baby_same_pay,bady_proxy_pay,bady_min_deposit ,reserve_time,reserve_stock_limit,date_latest ,date_start,num_balance,res_name,remark,lineInfo,operator_id,operator_name,product_attach ,confirm,unconfirm from ( SELECT trp.id,trp.res_id,trp.product_name,product_code,trp.num_stock,trp.num_sold,tr.date_latest ,adult_cost_price,adult_suggest_price,adult_same_pay,adult_proxy_pay,adult_min_deposit ,child_cost_price,child_suggest_price,child_same_pay,child_proxy_pay,child_min_deposit ,baby_cost_price,baby_suggest_price,baby_same_pay,bady_proxy_pay,bady_min_deposit ,reserve_time,reserve_stock_limit ,tr.date_start,tr.num_balance,tr.res_name,tr.remark,lineInfo,pi.operator_id,pi.operator_name, ifnull(patt.path, '') product_attach ,ifnull((select count(*) from product_group_supplier aa where aa.group_id=trp.res_id and aa.product_id=trp.product_code),0) as supplierCount ,ifnull((select count(*) from product_group_supplier aa where aa.group_id=trp.res_id and aa.product_id=trp.product_code and aa.supplier_id=#{page.parameter.currentOrgIdMappingSupplierId} ),0) as supplierCountMy ,ifnull(sale.confirm,0) confirm,ifnull(sale.unconfirm,0) unconfirm FROM traffic_res_product trp LEFT JOIN traffic_res tr on(tr.id=trp.res_id) LEFT JOIN product_info pi on(pi.id=trp.product_code) LEFT JOIN product_attachment patt on (patt.obj_id=pi.id and patt.type=2 and patt.obj_type=1) LEFT JOIN (select res_id, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS(' ',line_date,class_no,CONCAT(departure_city,'-',arrival_city), CONCAT(departure_time,'-',arrival_time)) separator '
') as lineInfo from traffic_res_line group by res_id) b ON(b.res_id=tr.id) left join (select res_product_id ,ifnull(sum(case when adjust_action='ORDER_SOLD' and adjust_state=0 then adjust_num else 0 end),0) unconfirm ,ifnull(sum(case when adjust_action='ORDER_SOLD' and adjust_state=1 then adjust_num else 0 end),0) confirm from traffic_res_stocklog where order_id>0 group by res_product_id ) as sale on sale.res_product_id=trp.id where tr.state=1 and trp.product_code>0 AND tr.biz_id =#{page.parameter.bizId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tr.date_latest >= now() AND trp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.parameter.productName},'%' ) and tr.res_method =#{page.parameter.resMethod} AND tr.date_start >= #{page.parameter.startMin} AND tr.date_start <= #{page.parameter.startMax} AND tr.res_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.parameter.resName},'%' ) ) aa where (supplierCountMy > 0 or supplierCount=supplierCountMy) ORDER BY date_start
select count(id) as id from traffic_res_product WHERE product_code =#{productCode} and res_id=#{resId}

SELECT id,res_id,product_code,product_name,num_sold,num_stock, sum(IFNULL((adult_cost_hotel+adult_cost_ticket+adult_cost_js+adult_cost_other)*num_sold,0)) sum_cost FROM traffic_res_product WHERE product_code=#{productCode} and res_id=#{resId}

SELECT trp.id,trp.product_code,trp.product_name,tr.date_start,lineInfo,adult_suggest_price,adult_cost_price,adult_suggest_price, adult_same_pay,adult_proxy_pay,child_cost_price,child_suggest_price,child_same_pay,child_proxy_pay ,baby_cost_price,baby_suggest_price,baby_same_pay,bady_proxy_pay,date_latest,trp.num_stock,tr.num_balance, trp.num_sold FROM traffic_res_product AS trp LEFT JOIN traffic_res AS tr ON(trp.res_id=tr.id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT res_id, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS(' ',line_date,class_no,CONCAT(departure_city,'-',arrival_city), CONCAT(departure_time,'-',arrival_time)) separator '
') AS lineInfo FROM traffic_res_line GROUP BY res_id) b ON(b.res_id=tr.id) WHERE trp.id=#{trpId} AND tr.id=#{resId}

SELECT id,product_name,product_code,res_id,date_start,num_stock,num_sold, unconfirm,confirm,num_balance FROM (SELECT trp.id,trp.product_name,trp.product_code,trp.res_id,tr.date_start,trp.num_stock,trp.num_sold, sale.unconfirm,sale.confirm,tr.num_balance ,ifnull((SELECT count(*) FROM product_group_supplier aa WHERE aa.group_id=trp.res_id AND aa.product_id=trp.product_code),0) AS supplierCount ,ifnull((SELECT count(*) FROM product_group_supplier aa WHERE aa.group_id=trp.res_id AND aa.product_id=trp.product_code AND aa.supplier_id=#{supplierId}),0) AS supplierCountMy FROM traffic_res_product AS trp LEFT JOIN traffic_res AS tr ON(trp.res_id=tr.id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT res_product_id ,ifnull(sum(CASE WHEN adjust_action='ORDER_SOLD' AND adjust_state=0 THEN adjust_num ELSE 0 END ),0) unconfirm ,ifnull(sum(CASE WHEN adjust_action='ORDER_SOLD' AND adjust_state=1 THEN adjust_num ELSE 0 END),0) confirm FROM traffic_res_stocklog WHERE order_id > 0 GROUP BY res_product_id) AS sale ON sale.res_product_id=trp.id WHERE tr.state = 1 AND trp.product_code > 0 AND tr.biz_id=#{bizId} AND tr.date_start=#{dateTime} AND tr.id=#{trId}) pp WHERE (supplierCountMy > 0 OR supplierCount=0)
